website_summaries.verdict: The best deal on hangers by far – you get an ample amount for most of your wardrobe needs at a price that makes your money go a long way.
pros: Versatile standard-sized plastic hangers with traditional shape
Lightweight yet fairly durable for most types of clothing
Features double-sided hooks and reinforced edges for added strength
cons: Somewhat flimsy – not ideal for heavy clothes – but if you need basic hangers for a low price, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and low quality
customer_reviews.text: The attached pic. shows a good quality hanger (orange), compared to the cheap white ones I purchased. The next pic shows the box people are talking about. I regret more and more Amazon puchases. Just add this to the list of very cheap products.
customer_reviews.author: super10701

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but no slots to snag your clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be lightweight. I would only use these for dress shirts, as a coat would probably just distort it over time. If you don't want to hang anything heavy they should work great. I bought these because every store just seems to carry hangers that have slots in the top angled bars to hang assorted things, so each time I want to remove my dress shirts from the closet, the shirt would get caught in those slots and I would have to reach in an unhook it. These have a nice smooth top, nothing snags on anything.
customer_reviews.author: DIY

customer_reviews.title: Came broken and disorganized
customer_reviews.text: 8 hangers came broken, 3 more were cracked but still usable. Hangers came loose and disorganized in a huge box. Not packaged well, which I am sure added to the problem. Also the hanger quality is pretty flimsy. Not worth the purchase, get hangers elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: rs

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are not strong hangers. They are not good for a winter coat. Perfect for a dress or a shirt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buckles Under Weight of Shower Curtain & Hooks
customer_reviews.text: Our shower curtain "assembly" consists of a cloth shower curtain [West Elm], Utopia Home Water-Repellent Antibacterial and Mildew Resistant 72-Inch-by-72-Inch Fabric Shower Curtain [Amazon], and 12 heavy duty shower curtain hooks...There is weight to OUR shower curtain "assembly". This rod CANNOT aesthetically handle the weight of our assembly because it buckles in the middle, forming an unsightly U-shape. It looked horrible! IFF (i.e., if and only if) you are using this product for a simple shower curtain and plastic/lightweight hooks, then it will be suitable for the job. It is super easy to install. The color is comparable to the advertised picture. The quality and (weight) capacity is exactly aligned with the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for shirts
customer_reviews.text: Basic hangers. Good for shirts, pants, the occasional light jacket. Not recommended for swinging on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Just standard cheaply made hangers that you can find at the dollar store. Not a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain. Handles our hoodies, jeans, and sweaters with no problem.
customer_reviews.text: On my second box of these now. Have no complaints at all. Saw some complaints about being too lightweight, but I have had no problem with using these with all my hoodies, sweaters, jeans, and other 'heavier than normal' stuff.
customer_reviews.author: IRgEEK

customer_reviews.title: As good as any other for a good price
customer_reviews.text: There was a shipping debacle but the product itself is great. PROS: They are of quality build, as good as any other plastic hangers I have encountered. Out of the pack of 60, they were very uniform and not a single one was deformed or defective. They seem like they will hold out well. CONS: None They are plastic hangers, and that's about it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are a great deal for the price, just be aware they're super thin. There seem to be "thin" and "thick" plastic hangers. These are the thing ones. I'm sure that's why they're so cheap, but it also means they can snap easily. They hold even the heaviest jackets we have, but one did break while pulling off a coat. Just keep it in mind.
customer_reviews.author: C. RobinsonTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Best Standard Everyday White Plastic Hangers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Standard Everyday White Plastic Hangars are exactly what I needed. Couldn't find them nearby and I don't shop much anymore, but my grandchildren needed some plastic hangars and I needed a few more. So, although 60 seemed a lot at first, they are keeping us all happy. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kailua Gram

customer_reviews.title: I have to admit I thought they would be the real cheap kind that was going to break easy but there are really sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Received them in one day. I have to admit I thought they would be the real cheap kind that was going to break easy but there are really sturdy and durable. My husband is a big man and his jeans are heavy and they hold up perfect and don’t bend and don’t leave the creases your clothing. I would give them a 10 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, instantly improved getting ready in the morning
customer_reviews.text: None of the hangers arrived broken and all are in good condition. The packaging was an adorable bonus. I never thought I'd be so happy to organize my closet! I am considering ordering another pack to do my husband's closet next. If you are looking to get rid of your mismatched hanger collection like me, you will be happy! I love that these do not have the notches in the sides for spaghetti straps, I didn't know how much better life could be by not fighting my closet every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hangers!!
customer_reviews.text: I will absolutely be ordering these again! They are exactly what I was looking for!! I hate when hangers have that cut out section on the top because it leaves awkward creases in my clothes - and literally every store I visit in person only carries the "cut out" ones. Finding these smooth hangers and at such a great price just made my closet very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: What can I say, they are hangers?
customer_reviews.text: I think these hangars were a great deal, 60 for $19.89. I had seen some hangars advertised that were unbreakable so I tried one of these out for "bendability". It flexed a good ways but it did eventually break. Since I don't normally hang things that would cause a hangar to bend to a 45 degree angle, I don't see a problem, :-). I give these hangars an A+.
customer_reviews.author: wb

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I don't like hangers with "grabbers" molded on the top of the hanger to keep clothing from slipping. They are annoying to me when not needed for heavier items. These don't have the "grabbers" and work great foe all my clothing. Thanks for this great, non-annoying hangers.
customer_reviews.author: lyn Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Been using these for 6 months and...
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are pleasantly sturdy and support all but my most heavy jackets. I have tried other plastic hangers and been disjointed. Not the case with these. Well worth the price per the number included. I would recommend these hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of lightweight hangers
customer_reviews.text: My wife seems to be a magnet for shirts which need to be hung, so we have periods of time when there aren’t enough hangers. I bought this set of 60 a couple months ago so we should be good for another year or so. The hanger quality is pretty good but I use heavier duty hangers for sweaters and jackets (which may be why none of mine have broken yet).
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sibbel

customer_reviews.title: Buy it for the box!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more than 5 stars I would. I haven’t used the hangers yet. I don’t care- they are hangers. But BUY this product because the box is awesome!!! DD and I made an amazing doll wardrobe out of it. We were super inspired by all the fancy designs and black and white pictures on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Scarab

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Above average hangers. I ordered these online, because all the stores in town only sell the newer plastic design that gives your shirts shoulder nipples if you know what I mean. They don’t quite get 5 stars due to sturdiness, however they work well so far. They were also well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: These hangars are somewhat thin, but that was in the description and I expected them to be so. They may not hold, say, a heavy winter coat, but for all other things--blouses, shirts, tees--they are more than adequate and are a good value with regards to the quantity you receive for the price. I am pleased. I wouldn't hesitate to buy then again.
customer_reviews.author: Goodhart Girl

customer_reviews.title: Decent price, good hangers.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed! Nothing outstanding about them but if you dont wanna go out right now but you need hangers these are the way to go! I do wish they were a bit sheaper but were in a pinch right now so they were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Light and skinny but bend easy too easily. Anything heavier than a shirt will cause it to bend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: They don't have the indentations along the top of the hangers, which make them perfect for projects
customer_reviews.text: They were made for a friend who likes the covered hangers to keep clothes from slipping off, don't leave marks in sweater shoulders, or when drying tops, and pants don't end up on the floor. I also have quite a few in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: cami

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at the dollar store
customer_reviews.text: maybe my expectations were too high... There isn't anything super special about these. I didn't return my purchase, however I bought the rest of what I needed from the dollar store - same quality, larger quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but does the job
customer_reviews.text: These are not nearly as thick as the description would lead you to believe. They are fine for a light weight shirt or blouse. Definitely not sturdy enough for pants of a thick sweater or jacket, etc. We got what we paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I can't love these hangers enough. Perfect! Durable, not flimsy. Full hanger, no opening at the top, smooth, and just what I was looking for. I will definitely continue to buy these in the future and the cost is reasonable as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Scheneman

customer_reviews.title: Closet classic
customer_reviews.text: Just the hangers I couldn't find at the store, smooth all around without those little hooks for the tank tops. Hold all the clothes, kids and adults, and I use two hagers to hold heavy coats.
customer_reviews.author: Vrnr

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what they are
customer_reviews.text: Break easily so we go through these in a hurry. Found out after shopping around that product's price was over inflated. You can do better on buying sets at your grocery store. This won't be a repeat buy.
customer_reviews.author: jhk

customer_reviews.title: Strong, quality for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great set of hangers. Not super high quality, but very good for the price you’re paying. Bought a ton of them and they’re holding up very well under some heavy clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaqib

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC hangers
customer_reviews.text: They are PLASTIC hangers, what more do you expect?? They’re like 35¢ each which is good enough. They get the job done. They are flimsy when you bend it a little. I’m not sure how they would handle a heavy piece of clothing but luckily I mostly own tank tops and light weighted tops and they work just fine. None of my hangers came broken which I’m very happy about considering the other reviews where they had some arrived broken. And the box it arrived in is super cute! Would I buy again??? Yeah why not!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Leos

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to dislike about. Add to cart.
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough to hold my heaviest pairs of jeans. *Not durable enough for kids to play with. They came in a strong big box. Was light enough to make me think I didn't recieve the proper amount. Price is well worth the product and amount given.
customer_reviews.author: Diego C.

customer_reviews.title: There are light and thin.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them thinking they were of a better quality, they described them as sturdy but they are light and thin,easy to disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Shun

customer_reviews.title: They are decent hangers and look nice.
customer_reviews.text: I broke a 2 out of 120 of them but I was being a little aggressive with them. Overall it’s nice having a matching lot of hangers to hang up my clothes for once. The hooks don’t seem to hold my low cut shirts up but t shirts and hoodies are perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Good design & price
customer_reviews.text: Great hanger set for adding more hangers to your closet or for replacing hangers to all match. Sturdy, have nice prongs to keep tanks/thin strapped items from slipping. Good price. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Catdiva77

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but durable plastic hangers.  Exactly what I expected.  Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why it's hard to find plastic hangers without the little dress loops but this set was exactly what I've been looking for. Simple cheap durable plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Was moving into a small apartment with no dressers only closets and needed hangers. We settled on these ones. The quality is good and the price was right. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: These Work
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to hang all my clothes on the same type of hanger sp I could immediately see the differences in length of each item. I have started replacing my old hangers with these new ones and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: greg kimmerly

customer_reviews.title: Great Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. We use a lot of hangers here at home and we have various types of hangers for particular uses but these hangers are what is used around the house 90% of the time. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: JnG

customer_reviews.title: You can never have enough hangers
customer_reviews.text: Unlike so many less expensive plastic hangers, these hangers don't snap, don't break, and don't snag clothing. They are thin but sturdy. I like the two small interior hooks for hanging items with thin straps and bathing suits.
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: These are nice hangers
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about durability - I just received them. I can say they feel sturdy and I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Cathlene S

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I needed more hangers and these were perfect. I ordered them in both white and gray. The box was a little beat up during shipping but the hangers were still in perfect condition. I use them to hang shirts and jackets. This is a great deal for 60 hangers. I would definitely repurchase these again if I ever need more hangers.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hangars
customer_reviews.text: These hangars are exactly what I was looking for. They are the same size as all the hangars I have acquired over many years. They are tubular (not flattish) and they are not sharp on the seam like some are. Those were the things that mattered most to me. Yes, they are slightly narrower than the oldest hangars I have, but so are all the hangars I've bought in the last 10 years. They are sturdy enough for everyday clothes. I'm very pleased. And they came in a nice box, so they were all neat when I unpacked them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Pippin

customer_reviews.title: Best quality hangers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best plastic tubular hangers I have bought and they even come in a cute box. I love that they don’t have the annoying slits at the top that leave awkward marks in shoulders especially when utilizing for hanging shirts to dry. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay
customer_reviews.text: Not really that strong two was broken in the box when I receive them and broke two in the mist of hanging up clothes these are not for heavy clothes
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For The Money
customer_reviews.text: The hangers met my expectations. I like the fact that they come with 2 hooks on each hanger, which facilitates storing one suit (a skirt and a blazer) on a single hanger. They also have a slender tubular design. I appreciate any product that saves space in my small closet. There were wisps of plastic (manufacturing remnants) on many of the hangers, though, which had to be removed prior to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works as a lightweight hangar should. Suggestion the decorative box was while cute, very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this order. I went to several stores in my area to find hangers like these but could not find any. I am glad my husband referred me to Amazon and recommended I buy these. They came in a box within a box. None of the hangers were broken. They hold all clothes: tank tops, dress shirts, t-shirts, coats, pants, etc. very well. They did not break even with heavy coats. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding hanger without the hooks and these worked perfect. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the hangers with the indent for a tank top or something. I don't know why he uses them for everything, because I feel they leave an indent in your shirts! I've been looking for this style hanger at Walmart and they never had them. So I found them here. Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good basic hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely good standard/basic hangers. I like that they do not have any rough spots that would snag clothing, but they are a little lightweight and will probably, eventually start to bow at the rung if jeans (or other heavy slacks) are hung on them. On the plus side, they are very reasonably priced and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing packaging
customer_reviews.text: They’re hangers. What can I say? They work. But the packaging it came in was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Santacular

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of them. They’re flimsy. Haven’t broken any yet- but I should have spent more money on thicker ones. They’re just Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P.

customer_reviews.title: You can never have enough hangers that match
customer_reviews.text: I have OCD and needed more hangers and they had to match the ones I already have. The local stores did not have this style so I sought out Amazon.com and Bam, there are he hangers I need. I did not need 60, but you never know about what you need in the future so the rest are stored atop the closet. All in all, just what I needed. Packaged very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LisaD

customer_reviews.title: My go to hanger for my husbands shirts.
customer_reviews.text: The size is good but they are slightly more flexible then I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kreuter

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight basic hangers....good for tshirts and kids clothes.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are what I needed. Not durable enough for jeans or heavy pants. I ordered them twice and the second time the hangers were different. So if you are expecting consistency or them to be like the picture, don't.
customer_reviews.author: Madi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done!
customer_reviews.text: The hangers came quickly and allowed me to forge ahead with my mission to get organized. They do the job and are fairly sturdy. I have other tubular hangers that are a bit more substantial, but these are fine and I have plenty left for if/when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Fabric Queen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are made thinner than the ones I have had in the past, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Cloverdale

customer_reviews.title: Check your local store for better deals!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a great deal on hangers... until I saw the set of 10 hangers for $1 at my local Fred Meyer (Kroger Store); which are equal to or better quality than the Best Standard Everyday White Plastic Hangers. Needless to say, I could have saved myself close to $20 and had just as many hangers if I hadn't purchased these. I feel so cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa DiVenti

customer_reviews.title: Width fits men’s shirts properly
customer_reviews.text: Width fits men’s shirts properly unlike so many other which are not wide. I also like that the are no bra hooks on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Barry James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as nice as hangers that cost more. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!  No snag hazards!
customer_reviews.text: These are quality hangers and they do not have the anoying slots in top of the hanger that snag your shirts when you remove your shirt like some hangers have. Good job. Will buy more as needed
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for these particular hangers for some time now. We can not find them in any store. I should have started with Amazon to start with. They are exactly what we were looking for. Great product at a good price. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Begeot

customer_reviews.title: decent and basic
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the highest quality hangers, but the price was fair for the amount of hangers received. They will work just fine for hanging light to mid-weight clothing. If you need a lot of basic hangers, I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: akincl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home and crafts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hangers for a craft project. I am very pleased with them. Sturdy, nice color, and very true to the product description. Will buy these again to use at home if I ever run out of hangers for my clothes. *will bend and warp if to much weight is on them*
customer_reviews.author: love to read

customer_reviews.title: Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I like this kind of hanger because it doesn’t stretch your clothes or leave a bump like the ones with the opening on the top. And they have the little curl on the inside to catch spaghetti straps so your clothes won’t fall off the hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Policriti

customer_reviews.title: They're coat hangers, what more do you want?!
customer_reviews.text: They're plastic coat hangers in bulk. They're perfect because I hate folding clothes. So far they're sturdy and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these multiple times. They never arrive broken and they hold up very well. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Finocchietti

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Well, except for the number of hangers. I think I probably only needed 20. Good value for family size, I gave half of them to my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenopolis

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely needed this amount of hangers as my weight has changed the do the job they do the job well you need hangers this is the perfect price form and they hold up great
customer_reviews.author: Mamatiger

customer_reviews.title: Hangs clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the box. So cute. And it’s hangers so it’s like any other hanger. It hangs clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Gitanjali Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Great value and A LOT!
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the box that says they are children's hangers, these fit adult clothes as well. So many hangers! Great for the price and if you have a lot of clothes. Say yes to these plastic hangers, and no wire hangers as Joan Crawford would say.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Came in a specially packaged box. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jrhaynes22

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Have used these hangers for a long tome and like them because they don’t put ‘points’ I the shoulders of my cotton tees. Will buy more in the future. They are light weight but work for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Glynis

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic hangers
customer_reviews.text: Nothing particularly special here. They are decent hangers for a fair price. Might be able to buy for less in some stores, but the convenience of amazon cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: I like that they don't have the recess on the shoulders ...
customer_reviews.text: A little on the thin side, but these weren't marketed for heavy winter jackets and such. I like that they don't have the recess on the shoulders that my dress shirts would always get snagged on like on some other designs.
customer_reviews.author: TheHelpful1

customer_reviews.title: They’re hangers...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hang your heavy jeans on them and you’ll be fine. They’re perfect for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: MissRaindrop

customer_reviews.title: Just like a homie, they are always down to hang out.
customer_reviews.text: These offer my clothes a great place to gang out.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light weight. Seems easy to break. Probably won't last long but with the price and amount, they are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your everyday hanger, except a little smaller.
customer_reviews.text: These hangers seem not smaller in length but just thinner plastic. They still do they have to do. I way overestimated how many hangers I needed though!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Bell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The hangers were as described. They came as promised. Very well packed. The customer followup was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: RedCisc

customer_reviews.title: Durable yet lightweight. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and as described by seller. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful75

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on no slot hangers
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for 60 hangers. All the ones in the stores have the slots on top, which I don't need for most of my clothes. Love that they are smooth on top so that clothes don't catch when trying to take them off the hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described. I was pleasantly surprised by the durability of the hangers. I hope to not need 60 hangers any time soon, but if I did, I would not hesitate to purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Tomatoes

customer_reviews.title: Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, plastic, hangers, not much to say about these except they are well packed and you get more than enough of them to satisfy a family. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for bulk hangers. I use them for shirts. I have not tried them with heavy winter coats.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best hanger for T-shirts
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers for the sleek & smooth top part. I hate buying the ones with the slots in the top because they make indentions on T-shirts.
customer_reviews.author: rachpres

customer_reviews.title: They are nice
customer_reviews.text: Light weight flexible. But they will hold my carhartt coat. Good hanger. Dollar General has the same hangers 10 for $1.50.
customer_reviews.author: Brewale4me

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and light weight. The little hooks are helpful for hanging dresses
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I hate wire hangers, and I hate the plastic ones with the notches. These fill my need!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff  Sees

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They seem a little more flimsy and thin than the tube-style hangers we already have, but in practice they are doing fine even for heavier coats.
customer_reviews.author: turtlemonvh

customer_reviews.title: Hangars without the hooks on the top.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Hangars without the hooks on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Hangers work great
customer_reviews.text: Hangers came in a box, it was well packaged no issues on any of it broken, it holds really well with all the clothes haven't had any issues, price is good and it's doing its job, we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have broken at least 10 just trying to hang clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Nakisha T.

customer_reviews.title: They're hangers
customer_reviews.text: What is there to like or dislike about hangers except for the fact that I didn't have to leave my house to buy them? My movers broke some and I needed more for clothing.They're exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Heide

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I have an oversized pipe in my closet to hang clothes on because the closet is long and I need the oversize pipe for durability none of the other hangers that I bought will slide on the pipe because the hook end is too small and these are the only ones that fit I will continue to buy them
customer_reviews.author: Hap Graf

customer_reviews.title: Normal plastic hangers.
customer_reviews.text: They are plastic hangers. Not much more to say. Self explanatory. Came on time. 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mellin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were so pleased with these hangers! Not a single broken one! I’m so sick of not being able to find regular hangers at the store! So to get 60 of them mailed to me was wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mattson

customer_reviews.title: They're hangers.  What more can you say.
customer_reviews.text: They're as durable and high-quality as you'd expect plastic hangers to be. If you need anything more sturdy you need to be investing in a better product. But they're perfect for all but the heaviest garments. Also you get a ton of them for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Culmer

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Does a great job for both shirts and pants
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hangorize 60 Standard Everyday White Plastic Hangers, Long Lasting Tubular Clothes Hangers, Value Pack of 60 Clothing Hangers. (60 Pack)
feature_bullets: Best value – This set of 60 heavy duty white hangers offer a reinforced edge on both sides, in addition to a strong and flexible one-piece design, insuring that it will last for years to come.
Unique - Each one of these plastic hangers are equipped with 2 hooks on both sides to hang strappy clothes, as well as with an intended groove line on the bottom bar to use as non slip pant hangers.
Smooth & Notch-Free - Its classic shiny finish on top will prevent snags making it perfect to use as suit hangers, it also enables an easy and hassle-free pull off experience of your hanging shirts.
Strong and Lightweight - Its ultra-compact design makes closet organizing efficient and possible! These space saver hangers help you fit 50% more cloth items into the same closet space.
Cute and safe packaging – Each of this multi hanger set is carefully packaged in a beautifully designed corrugated box, to ensure a pleasant and happy delivery experience.
